channel.title: Locked Registration

it should or shoulnt be locked for etc.
i agree because that r teh 1337 idea[/end of post]

item.title: Locked Registration
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

1337h4x:

We should close moparisthebest.com registrations so our noob infestiation would cease to grow.

item.title: Locked Registration
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Whoah whoah, mopar you shouldn’t even tell them they could answer them easily on google! That gives them ideas, then the second they are in BAM! WHERE DO I DOWNLDED MORODRSCAPE??

Also, therealjdb, you posted the answers on there. They still have access to the forums without being registered you know, and could see those answers.

Isn’t this beautiful? No moparscape questions.

item.title: Locked Registration
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:27, topic:54501”][quote author=MybJames link=topic=76973.msg869989#msg869989 date=1170773346]
look some noob is just going to get all the answer’s put it in a word doc and host it somewhere.
[/quote]

10 questions are randomly selected from a database of 20 and I can always add more, so good luck to them. :)[/quote]

Ahaha nice.

Also, I think you should add some questions on the rules. For example:

Do we make spelling mistakes on purpose?

  • Yes
  • No

Read full topic

item.title: Locked Registration
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:54501”]It should never be locked because a community needs members to grow, and it cuts off any members with potential.

A quiz system is going to be implemented soon, just have patience since mopar is busy. That will filter our the complete morons refusing to learn and cooperate.[/quote]
Smart thinking, what chris said.

Also, you never know what people might come and make a difference to our cheating/macroing experience. What have we got too lose?

Read full topic

item.title: Locked Registration
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

heres your answer Mod Taharok [quote=“Mod Taharok, post:5, topic:54501”]Usually suggestions in this forum have reasons behind them. What is the purpose of posting this topic? Why do you want registration to stop? It is hard to ask a question when there is only one side to it, and that side is not even being created by the person who ask the question.[/quote]

heres a quote from javacisnotrecognized[quote=“javacisnotrecognized”]NO!

Just make it so that new people can’t post there. Or better yet, stop letting people make accounts in general.[/quote]

and heres one from Silver Lining

silver lining:

Locked registration would be wondrous.

Read full topic

item.title: Locked Registration
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:16, topic:54501”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=76973.msg864521#msg864521 date=1170648203]
The quiz has been successfully installed and all new members must pass it before they can post or pm.

After a few days pass and I can be sure there are no problems with the quiz all of the current members will have to pass it before they can post again as well.

A big thanks to Kamu who wrote the engine for the quiz, It should make a big difference.
[/quote]
What questions are on it? Or should I just go click register and see?[/quote]
I saw most of them… Unless more were added, I knew the answer to them all but I can tell you that if you don’t know the answer, it will take a 10 second google search.

Watch the average registrations go down really fast now

Read full topic
